snippet: One ad promotes steps Coke has taken, like prominently showing calorie counts and increasing the number of its brands sold in smaller cans, to help consumers make healthier choices.
abstract: Coca-Cola Co launches new television ad campaign aimed at getting on healthy side of national debate over obesity; one ad promotes steps Coke has taken, like prominently showing calorie counts and increasing the number of its brands sold in smaller cans, to help consumers make healthier choices.
lead_paragraph: One ad promotes steps Coke has taken, like prominently showing calorie counts and increasing the number of its brands sold in smaller cans, to help consumers make healthier choices.

headline.seo: Coke TV Ads Confront Obesity and Soda’s Role
headline.main: In Ads, Coke Confronts Soda’s Link to Obesity
headline.print_headline: In Ads, Coke Confronts Soda’s Link to Obesity
